attributes.action: BBC To Allow Equal Airtime For All Political Parties
attributes.additional_details:
With the apparent left-wing bias in the BBC, we don't see enough of the other political parties in the UK and what their aims are.
This is very unequal.
We see the UKIP and not the BNP, we see the Conservative more than the Labour or Lib Dems.
We should pass a law to make our state TV and Radio give equal airtime to all parties.
Vote for this now.
